verses: <sup>1</sup>How good and pleasant it is when God’s people live together in unity! <sup>2</sup>It is like precious oil poured on the head, running down on the beard, running down on Aaron’s beard, down on the collar of his robe. <sup>3</sup>It is as if the dew of Hermon were falling on Mount Zion. For there the Lord bestows his blessing, even life forevermore.
